summary: In 1885, after years of retirement, West is called in from his Mexican home, and Gordon is taken off the road as a Shakespearian actor to track down and arrest Dr. Michelito Loveless, Jr. ... See full summary Â»
cast: Robert Conrad|Ross Martin|Paul Williams|Harry Morgan|Rene Auberjonois|Jo Ann Harris|Trisha Noble|Jeff MacKay|Susan Blu|Pavla Ustinov|Robert Shields|Lorene Yarnell Jansson|Wilford Brimley|Ted Hartley|Skip Homeier|Jacquelyn Hyde|Joyce Jameson|Alberto Morin|Mike Wagner|John Wheeler|Jeff Redford|Bill Hart|Richard Paul|W.K. Stratton|Red West
title: The Wild Wild West Revisited
